olm.general.mgL_to_molL¶

olm.general.mgL_to_molL(mgL, ion)[source]¶

Converts concentrations from mg/L to mol/L.

Parameters
mgLfloat or array

concentration in mg/L

ionstr

name of ion

Returns
molLfloat or array

concentration in mol/L
